item.title: Predictive Analytics
item.description: Predictive Analytics At AIT we use historical data, statistical algorithms and machine learning techniques to predict future events.

item.title: Predictive Maintenance
item.description: Predictive Maintenance Predictive maintenance refers to a holistic approach to monitoring the history and condition of industrial equipment in order to determine when maintenance activities should be carried out.

item.title: Home
item.description: Network Analysis Network Security and Anomaly Detection AI can largely increase the detection accuracy of attacks and other threats flowing through the network and impacting end devices, without sacrificing the robustness of the analysis (i.

item.title: Consumer Protection
item.description: Consumer Protection Prevention is a key instrument in fighting cybercrime. Technological solutions that actively inform, enlighten and protect consumers and their representative bodies are an important addition to preventive measures both in terms of capacity and speed in fighting illegitimate subscription services, counterfeit goods and fraudulent e-commerce offerings.

item.title: Public Safety
item.description: Public Safety AIT provides solutions for the forensic analysis of audio-video material, with features that address the requirements of end users including service providers and stakeholders such as law enforcement agencies (LEAs).
